## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0a13418a263874a36e4824abaf66e342c0fd44c0ac9ac93dbc6c057449e0f22f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'rncalendareventsexample' @ 0.0.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
